title: Sony PS4 to get colour faceplates on 18 November, here are the personalisation options
text:
Sony PS4 to get colour faceplates on 18 November, here are the personalisation options 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Sony has announced that PS4 owners are no longer stuck with one colour of console. It will be releasing a selection of varying coloured face...
